TC-13.3-01.description: Generate profile for a company with extremely long descriptive text
TC-13.3-01.input_type: Company with extensive history, products, and narrative sections
TC-13.3-01.expected_result: Output completes without mid-sentence truncation; all sections are present and readable.

TC-13.3-02.description: Generate profile for a company with many office locations
TC-13.3-02.expected_result: Output contains all office locations or applies documented pagination/summary logic; no abrupt cutoff.

TC-13.3-03.description: Verify JSON / schema structural integrity under high token load
TC-13.3-03.expected_result: Output parses successfully; no missing braces, quotes, or incomplete arrays.

TC-13.3-04.description: Detect mid-sentence cutoff due to token exhaustion
TC-13.3-04.input_type: Stress entity near max token threshold
TC-13.3-04.expected_result: Output ends at logical boundary (sentence/section); no partial tokens or broken words.

TC-13.3-05.description: Validate graceful degradation when token limit is reached
TC-13.3-05.expected_result: System applies summarization, chunking, or continuation strategy instead of truncation.

TC-13.3-06.description: Ensure mandatory sections are not dropped due to token limits
TC-13.3-06.input_type: Max-size entity with all parameters populated
TC-13.3-06.expected_result: All mandatory schema sections are present or explicitly flagged as summarized.
